name: Alfred E. LANCELLOTTI v. Alma U. LANCELLOTTI

parties: Alfred E. LANCELLOTTI v. Alma U. LANCELLOTTI.

opinions.text:
ORDER
Petitioner herein seeks a writ of certiora-ri to review the Family Court judge’s denial of his motion for relief under Rule 60(b) of the Rules of Domestic Relations. Since the order denying his motion is appealable, however, we hereby treat the petition for certiorari as a timely filed notice of appeal from said order. The motion for stay is denied.

attorneys: Joseph E. Marran, Jr., Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Howard I. Lipsey, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Alfred E. LANCELLOTTI v. Alma U. LANCELLOTTI.
No. 82-528-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Dec. 19, 1982.
Joseph E. Marran, Jr., Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Howard I. Lipsey, Providence, for respondent.
